EmailTemplate.description: Reminder that CMMs are only available to authorized repair centers.
EmailTemplate.name: Pubs CMM Denial
EmailTemplate.subject: BendixKing Publication Request {!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for contacting BendixKing Technical Publications.
BendixKing Component Maintenance Manuals are only made available to authorized Repair Partners. A list of approved Repair Partners can be found at bendixking.com.
For return to service documentation, go to the Tech Pubs section of myaerospace.com and search for the Service Aid associated with your part number.
https://myaerospace2.honeywell.com/wps/myportal/tech-pubs
Thank you,
BendixKing Technical Publications Team Access your publications online at myaerospace.com http://www.bendixking.com
{!EmailMessage.TextBody}
